sys_hub_action_type_definition.annotation: Update the value of a Catalog Item variable.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.copied_from_name: Copy of Update Catalog Item Vari
sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
This action is used to place an order for a catalog item. Inputs required: - Requested For User - Catalog Item - Variable Values
NOTE: Please ensure all the required variables are provided
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Order a Catalog Item
